lines.text: The robber was probably a vampire, see?
He walked in, the wizards offered him a bottle of blood to drink...
But it was poisoned! They poisoned the blood!
With... garlic! They ground up some garlic and shook it in there!
Or... wait. No. It doesn't look like there's any garlic around here... probably not holy water, either...
Right. Yeah. THAT'S the main reason why that idea is dumb.
